name: Adventure Run
description:
Hi everyone!

I'm glad to present you a new game Adventure Run!

Join the Great Adventure with beautiful characters and amazing worlds!

Run to get the Finish, jump and shoot to survive!

Features:

  • FREE TO PLAY!
  • Kill the Zombies!
  • Jump over obstacles!
  • 3 Endless levels and 5 worlds!
  • 15 interesting and difficult levels!
  • 9 cute characters!
  • Collect Coins!
  • Beat the highscore!
  • Get achievements!
  • Amazing sound track!
  • 2 types of powerups!
  • Run and Jump![/B]
